metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9543 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In trim_device of f2fs_format_utils.c, it is possible that the data partition is not wiped during a factory reset. This could lead to local information disclosure after factory reset with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-112868088.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
